text: Smotri (o Mukhammad!), kak oni nagovarivayut na tebya, utverzhdaya, chto ty libo chelovek, oputannyy charami, libo monakh, libo poet. Eto oni - nevernyye - sbilis' s puti logicheskikh dokazatel'stv. Oni ved' ne nakhodyat dlya otritsaniya tvoyey very veskikh prichin, kotoryye mozhno bylo by prinyat'. Tak oni okazalis' v zabluzhdenii i poteryali put' k istine
